1370: Grote moved to Breestraat.A.27 after marriage.
Got married to Lelien at age 19 in 1370.
Had a son with Lelien, Mewekinus, at age 19.
1371: Had a daughter with Lelien, Siburgis, at age 20.
1375: Had a son with Lelien, Robbrecht, at age 24.
1376: Had a son with Lelien, Ripperti, at age 25.
Lost son Robbrecht when Robbrecht was 2 years old.
1381: Had a daughter with Lelien, Wendelmodis, at age 30.
Lost daughter Wendelmodis when Wendelmodis was 1 years old.
1382: Had a daughter with Lelien, Cecilia, at age 31.
1384: Had a daughter with Lelien, Diewiven, at age 33.
1385: Had a daughter with Lelien, Gertrudis, at age 34.
1390: Lost daughter Gertrudis when Gertrudis was 6 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1393: Lost daughter Siburgis when Siburgis was 23 years old.
1396: Lost daughter Diewiven when Diewiven was 13 years old.
1397: Lost son Mewekinus when Mewekinus was 28 years old.
